resource.title: Onimille Pixelart Tutorials
resource.body: !format (( Onimille's blog contains a number of tutorials focused on pixelart fundamentals and step-by-step processes for creating various textures. )) (( Whether you're just starting out or have years of experience, the collection can has plenty of fantastic references and tips for making high-quality pixelart. Be sure to look through and bookmark the page so you don't miss any new posts! ))
